title: FS: 1907 Grignon Slagle Postcard, 1914 John McGraw Postcard
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1907 Grignon Slagle Postcard, 1914 John McGraw Postcard
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
I have the following pieces for sale:

1907 Grignon Postcard of James Slagle of the Cubs.
Postally used and shows some wear but overall pretty nice. SOLD

1914 American Art Publishing Postcard of John McGraw.
Postally used with usual wear. $25.00

Please add $10.00 for shipping from Canada (includes tracking and insurance). Paypal works for me! PM or post if interested and thanks for looking.

Price drop:

Grignon Slagle [STRIKE]$150.00[/STRIKE] $120.00


McGraw [STRIKE]$25.00[/STRIKE] $15.00

Take the pair for $130.00 plus shipping!

Grignon postcard is sold. Shoot me an offer on the McGraw. Cheers!
Jeff
